name: carpentry-block-theme
description: Modern block theme for ServiLucas - Professional carpentry and renovation services with Full Site Editing support

scripts.theme-zip: npm run build:all && rm -f carpentry-block-theme.zip && cd .. && zip -r carpentry-block-theme/carpentry-block-theme.zip carpentry-block-theme -x 'carpentry-block-theme/node_modules/*' 'carpentry-block-theme/src/*' 'carpentry-block-theme/scss/*' 'carpentry-block-theme/.git/*' 'carpentry-block-theme/.github/*' 'carpentry-block-theme/package*.json' 'carpentry-block-theme/webpack.config.js' 'carpentry-block-theme/*.md' 'carpentry-block-theme/.gitignore' 'carpentry-block-theme/carpentry-block-theme.zip' 'carpentry-block-theme/carpentry-block-theme/*'
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run build:sass && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run start" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:assets"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:assets && npm run build:sass

author: ServiLucas
